name: SkaterBot Simulation
description:
Robot revolution happened in 1986 when the Macintosh Plus was launched.

Now you can control this little cute world destroyer who loves pokemon and skateboarding.

Watch out for holes and the timing of the simulation running out.

Try reaching the finishing line with all of the 10 diskettes(Floppy disks).

This was the first game I was able to finish and I know there is a lot of things missing, but I'm really happy for being able to finish a project.

The only assets I didn't make myself were the sound effects that I got from freesound.org

including the:

Skateboard Sound  by dersuperanton freesound.org"

THANK YOU ALL SO MUCH FOR THE OPPORTUNITY!
